name: Gifts, etc., to counties from corporation
text:
E.  Public Housing; Corporation-County Cooperation
Note
  Subpart heading amended by L 1998, c 212, §12.
  Effective July 1, 2006, "Corporation" in subpart heading changed to "Administration".  L 2005, c 196, §26(a).
 []   [Section effective until June 30, 2006.  For section effective July 1, 2006, see below.]  The corporation may make and pay gifts, or donations, of money directly to any county.  Any county may receive the gifts or donations as a general fund realization, and expend the same for any purpose authorized by law. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]
E.  Public Housing; Administration-County Cooperation
Note
  Subpart heading amended by L 1998, c 212, §12.
  Effective July 1, 2006, "Corporation" in subpart heading changed to "Administration".  L 2005, c 196, §26(a).
   Gifts, etc., to counties from administration. [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The administration may make and pay gifts, or donations, of money directly to any county.  Any county may receive the gifts or donations as a general fund realization, and expend the same for any purpose authorized by law. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
